title: Zak 2-month Trial Period
body:
## Intro

This proposal is for kicking off my **2-month trial period** as a full-time contributor for R Group.

Like the rest of the DAO, we’re just getting things started, but have reached consensus on a high-level set of processes, including our approach to [contributor onboarding and compensation guidelines](https://docs.google.com/document/d/1TxkoelIV7HV5kV6yn30id6EY3hv7i-j-JvJ-HvNxeB4/edit?usp=sharing).

## Scope

During this trial period, I will contribute to the DAO according to the following document: [Zak @ Rarible DAO - Contribution](https://docs.google.com/document/d/1pxnwJwdZxBPDzaxHIq2bTFrA2DTP8ps9_bmxhBqTo34/edit?usp=sharing).

After the 2-month trial period, I will submit another proposal for a longer-term engagement, contingent on:

+ My contributions, role, and outputs during the 2 month trial period
+ Passing the vibe check with the rest of R Group and DAO

## Compensation

|  Item | Amount  | 
|---|---|
| Base  |  $6,600  |
| Market-based  | $5,000 |
| Experience-based (10 years x $500)   | $5,000 |
| **Total**   | **$16,600** |

Payments can be made at any interval <= 1 month, and in any ERC-20 with sufficient liquidity on any blockchain with a bridge to ETH.

## Rationale

+ I have over **12 years of professional experience** as a software engineer across a variety of different teams and environments, and have served as an individual contributor, team lead, and architect
+ I have built, shipped, and maintained several high-quality [open source projects](https://github.com/zakangelle) over the course of my career and keep a strong pulse on cutting-edge front end practices and emerging web3 conventions
+ Previously I spent the last 10 months as a full-time contributor to [Boardroom](https://www.boardroom.info/), a crypto governance aggregation platform where I served as lead front end engineer and architect -- I’ve also recently contributed in a part-time capacity to [Alchemist](https://www.alchemist.wtf/) and [Screensaver](https://www.screensaver.world/)
+ This is equivalent to a **$199,200 / year** salary compensation, which is in line with previous full-time compensation of mine and current market rates given my experience and quality of output

## Additional Compensation

Additional compensation is alluded to in other compensation docs floating around in the form of vesting equity via **$RARI**. This will be discussed after the 2-month trial period if my full-time engagement will continue.
author: 0x8AbAf5733742B1506F6a1255de0e37aEc76b7940
